data.prayer: Spirit, please give new believers a yearning to see you praised in Kagawa, Japan.
data.verse: Declare his glory among the nations, his marvelous deeds among all peoples.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Kagawa, Japan
data.section_summary: What conditions of religion or environment could you pray for here?

data.prayer: Father, you said, "The earth belongs to Me and all that is in it". Please, call Kagawa, Japan into obedience and eternal life.
data.verse: The earth is Yahweh’s, with its fullness; the world, and those who dwell therein.

data.prayer: Spirit, how will they hear without a preacher? How will they preach unless they have a Bible? Please give the people in the state of Kagawa access to a Bible in their own language.
data.verse: How, then, can they call on the one they have not believed in? And how can they believe in the one of whom they have not heard? And how can they hear without someone preaching to them? And how can anyone preach unless they are sent? As it is written: “How beautiful are the feet of those who bring good news!”

data.prayer: Spirit, teach the 5,636 believers in the state of Kagawa the wisdom of how to form simple, reproducible churches of 12-30 in every neighborhood.
Father, 0.3% are known to be believers. Please, Lord call more today.
Father, please raise up every one you have called in Kagawa, Japan to become worthy of their calling, and offer spiritual sacrifices acceptable to you through Jesus.
data.verse: I urge you to live a life worthy of the calling you have received

data.prayer: Spirit, help every believer in Kagawa, Japan be prepared to give an answer to everyone who asks them for the reason for their hope.
data.verse: But in your hearts revere Christ as Lord. Always be prepared to give an answer to everyone who asks you to give the reason for the hope that you have. But do this with gentleness and respect.

data.prayer: Spirit, encourage the church in Kagawa, Japan to make the most of every opportunity.
data.verse: Be very careful, then, how you live—not as unwise but as wise, making the most of every opportunity, because the days are evil.

location.name: Kagawa
